Description: AWS CloudFormation template to create an AD Connector to connect to an on-premises directory, seamless domain join resources, domain members security group, and DHCPOptionSet.

ADConnectorDnsIpAddresses.Description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers in the on-premises directory

DomainDNSName.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the on-premises directory

DomainNetBIOSName.Description: NetBIOS name of the on-premises directory

CreateSecurityGroup.Description: Create a domain members security group that allows all PrivateIP communications inbound

CreateDHCPOptionsSet.Description: Create a DHCPOptionSet pointing to Domain DNS servers

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for domain members allowing PrivateIP communication
Temporary Security Group to avoid circular dependency
